data.text: Wo fa be, won xa gbilen Alatala ma!
Xi firin na dangi, a fama nɛ won nayalande,
Won xa Alatala fen, won xa a kolon.
«N munse rabama i tan na, Efirami?
N wo gerema namiɲɔnmɛe xa masenyie ra na nan ma,
Hinnɛ rafan n ma dangife sɛrɛxɛ ra,
E bara n ma saatɛ kana,
Mixi ɲaaxi wuya Galadi, faxɛtie bara gbo naa.
Sɛrɛxɛdubɛe baganma mixi ma Sikemi kira xɔn ma alɔ muɲɛtie.
N bara fe ɲaaxie to Isirayilakae tagi:
Yudaya, n na gɛ n ma ɲama ragbilende konyiya kui,
